text: James Henry Drees (July 6, 1930 â€“ June 20, 2022) was an American politician. He was born in Manning, Iowa. He was in the Iowa House of Representatives from 1995 to 2001 as a member of the Democratic Party. Drees died on June 20, 2022 in Carroll, Iowa at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: James Drees
